# inputImage

**Instance Property**

The image to use as an input image.

## Declaration

```swift
var inputImage: CIImage? { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **headIndex**: A number that specifies which output of a multihead Core ML model applies the effect on the image.
- **model**: The Core ML model used to apply the effect on the image.
- **softmaxNormalization**: A Boolean value that specifies whether to apply Softmax normalization to the output of the model.
